I want to build cobblestone generators on **ALL** my skyblock world islands, so that an unlimited supply of my favourite block is always a *stone's* throw away! I can never remember where the water and lava go though... mind helping me out?

Here's a quick tutorial I pulled up for your reference:
![tutorial](tutorial.png)

Have fun, and thanks for the help!
